entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
